SmartTextBox demos

SmartTextBox project page

Standard with enter submit

Type some text then press enter to create a box

Click here to see the code 
$(document).ready(function(){
  $("#testContainer").smartTextBox({submitKeys : [13],submitChars : []});
});

Standard with comma and semicolon submit

Type some text then press ',' or ";" to create a box

Click here to see the code 
$(document).ready(function(){
  $("#testContainer2").smartTextBox({submitKeys : [],submitChars : [",",";"]});
});

Autocompletion

Start typing some text to see the autocomplete suggestions.

Values are : ["lorem", "ipsum", "dummy", "john", "woo", "browser", "sunrise", "loras", "lorim"];

Click here to see the code 
$(document).ready(function(){
  var autoVals = ["lorem", "ipsum", "dummy", "john", "woo", "browser", "sunrise", "loras", "lorim"];
  $("#testContainer3").smartTextBox({autocompleteValues: autoVals});
});

API calls

Choose an action :





Click here to see the code 
$(document).ready(function(){
	$("#testContainer4").smartTextBox();
	$("#testContainer4").smartTextBox("load", ['john', 'woo', 'padawan' ]); 
});
function addBox() {
	var val = prompt("Enter new box value");
	if(val) $('#testContainer4').smartTextBox('add', val);
}
function removeBox() {
	var val = prompt("Enter value or index of box to remove");
	if(val) $('#testContainer4').smartTextBox('remove', val);
}	
function removeAll() {
	$('#testContainer4').smartTextBox('clear');
}
function setAll() {
	var val = prompt("Enter values of boxes, separated by ';'");
	if(val) $('#testContainer4').smartTextBox('load', val);
}
function setAutocomplete() {
	var val = prompt("Enter values of autocomplete options, separated by ';'");
	if(val) $('#testContainer4').smartTextBox('autocomplete', val);
}

Original input value test (pipe separator)


Add or remove boxes then click to see the updated input value.

The original input value = ''

Click here to see the code 
$(document).ready(function(){
	$("#testContainer5").smartTextBox({separator : "|"});
});
function showOrigInputValue() {
	$('#origInputP').show();
	$('#origInputValue').text($('#testContainer5').val())
}

Events handling

Add or remove boxes to see custom event handling

Click here to see the code 
$(document).ready(function(){
	$("#testContainer6").smartTextBox({
		onElementAdd : function(el, stb) {
			$("#demo6writer").text("Added an element with label : " + el.getValue());	
		},
		onElementRemove : function(el, stb) {
			$("#demo6writer").text("Removed an element with label : " + el.getValue());
		}
	});
});
